## Esna 175 {-}

- Location: Column D, middle
- Date: Domitian

<div class="col2">

| *[ʿnḫ nṯr nfr]  *
| *ỉwʿ n Rʿ  *
| *pẖr-ns.t n nb ḥḥ  *
| *nb srḫ   *
| *ʿpr-ẖkr.w  *
| *wṯz ḫʿ* 
|    *mỉ zȝ Is.t  *
| *nb-tȝ.wy  *
| *(twmtyns nty-ḫwỉ)|  *
|  
| [Live the good god],
| heir of Re,
| successor of the Lord of Millions,
| lord of the *serekh*,
| fitted with regalia,
| who wears the crown 
|    like the son of Isis,
| Lord of the Two Lands,
| (Domitian Augustus)|

</div>
